attributes.action: Deny Russian-owned vessels (ships/tankers) access to all UK ports.
attributes.additional_details: The UK stance in support of Ukraine against Russian aggression must be decisive and complete.
attributes.background:
We have limited sanctions in place and stopped Russian owned aircraft from landing in the UK, yet Russian ships are still docking at UK ports - such as Sovcomflot at Flotta oil terminal this very week. 
Sanctions must be applied and all Russian registered ships should be denied entry to UK ports.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition Russian ships banned from UK ports. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-introduces-new-sanctions-against-russia-including-ban-on-ships-and-fresh-financial-measures
